Generation VII.Sun: It is said to be a female evolution of Cosmog . When its third eye activates, away it flies to another world.
Generation VII.Moon: Said to live in another world, this Pokémon devours light, drawing the moonless dark veil of night over the brightness of day.
Generation VII.Ultra Sun: Records of it exist in writings from long, long ago, where it was known by the name “the beast that calls the moon.”
Generation VII.Ultra Moon: It sometimes summons unknown powers and life-forms here to this world from holes that lead to other worlds.

Generation VIII.Sword: Known as the Beast That Calls the Moon, this Pokémon lives by taking in any and all light and converting it into its own energy. *
Generation VIII.Shield: It steals the light from its surroundings and then becomes the full moon, showering its own light across the night sky. *

Generation VII.Moon: Altar of the Moone ( Only one )

Generation VIII.Shield Expansion Pass: Max Lair ( Dynamax Adventure ) ( Only one )

Generation IX.The Hidden Treasure of Area Zero (Scarle: Casseroya Lake after receiving the Lunala Treat from Snacksworth ( Only one ) ( Group Quest )
Generation IX.The Hidden Treasure of Area Zero (Violet: Casseroya Lake after receiving the Lunala Treat from Snacksworth ( Only one ) ( Solo Quest )
